title: Leave the Preparation to Me!
detail_text: <:th_ch0205/>Lanzhu, do you have the beach ball ready?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Yes!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>How about floats and water guns?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Leave it to me!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>We can borrow the beach parasols....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>We should also bring at least 3 box coolers!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>You said you wanted to do a watermelon splitting, right? You can be the first one!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Kyaaah! Lanzhu is so excited for it! Lanzhu will split it clean in one try!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Ahaha, that does seem possible coming from you! Going to the beach with everyone will be so much fun~! Ai is raring to go♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Lanzhu can’t wait too–!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
